headline.main: Polish voters head to polls to pick a president
headline.sub: Polish voters head to polls to pick a president

docs.snippet: Polish presidential race too close to call as voters go to the polls. Rough cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Polish presidential race too close to call as voters go to the polls. Rough cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Colorful Federer's Mood Darkened Despite Easy Win
headline.print_headline: Colorful Federer's Mood Darkened Despite Easy Win

docs.snippet: An eagerly-anticipated French Open began with a brisk Sunday morning workout for last year's women's runner-up Simona Halep as day one's star turn Roger Federer waited in the wings....
docs.lead_paragraph: An eagerly-anticipated French Open began with a brisk Sunday morning workout for last year's women's runner-up Simona Halep as day one's star turn Roger Federer waited in the wings.

headline.main: U.N., EU, Africa Urge Dialogue in Burundi After Politician's Killing
headline.print_headline: U.N., EU, Africa Urge Dialogue in Burundi After Politician's Killing

docs.snippet: U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon urged Burundi's government and its opponents not to let violence derail United Nations-sponsored talks, after the killing of an opposition leader prompted some opponents to say they would walk out....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon urged Burundi's government and its opponents not to let violence derail United Nations-sponsored talks, after the killing of an opposition leader prompted some opponents to say they would walk out.

headline.main: Calm Cook, Sublime Stokes Give England the Edge
headline.print_headline: Calm Cook, Sublime Stokes Give England the Edge

docs.snippet: Alastair Cook and Joe Root shared a gritty unbroken century partnership to lift England to 175 for three at lunch against New Zealand on the fourth day of the first test at Lord's on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alastair Cook and Joe Root shared a gritty unbroken century partnership to lift England to 175 for three at lunch against New Zealand on the fourth day of the first test at Lord's on Sunday.

headline.main: Flooding in Texas and Oklahoma Prompts Rescues and Evacuations
headline.print_headline: Storms Flood Plains, Midwest, Killing 3, Forcing Evacuations

docs.snippet: Flooding overnight in Texas and Oklahoma has led to numerous evacuations and rescues including some of residents stranded on rooftops and in attics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Flooding overnight in Texas and Oklahoma has led to numerous evacuations and rescues including some of residents stranded on rooftops and in attics.

headline.main: After Bruising Safety Crisis, U.S. Car Watchdog Shows Its Bite
headline.print_headline: After Bruising Safety Crisis, U.S. Car Watchdog Shows Its Bite

docs.snippet: The U.S. auto safety watchdog, long criticized as toothless and slow, is showing both bark and bite under its new boss - a testimony to his credentials as a safety expert and a hardening of the administration's policy after a wave of deadly defect...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. auto safety watchdog, long criticized as toothless and slow, is showing both bark and bite under its new boss - a testimony to his credentials as a safety expert and a hardening of the administration's policy after a wave of deadly defects.

headline.main: Perry Seeks to Win Over Iowa, a Handshake at a Time
headline.print_headline: Perry Seeks to Win Over Iowa, a Handshake at a Time

docs.snippet: Former Texas Gov. Rick Perry is working his way through small-town Iowa one handshake, bear hug and backslap at a time....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Texas Gov. Rick Perry is working his way through small-town Iowa one handshake, bear hug and backslap at a time.

headline.main: Thanks to a 4-Year-Old, a Laugh Stronger Than Death

docs.snippet: Silence doesn’t protect our kids. It steals their chance to say goodbye....

headline.main: Susan Sarandon Urges Tourists to Visit Earthquake-Hit Nepal
headline.print_headline: Susan Sarandon Urges Tourists to Visit Earthquake-Hit Nepal

docs.snippet: Oscar-winning Hollywood actress Susan Sarandon is urging tourists to come to Nepal, where two powerful earthquakes in the last month killed thousands of people and made several hundreds of thousands homeless....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oscar-winning Hollywood actress Susan Sarandon is urging tourists to come to Nepal, where two powerful earthquakes in the last month killed thousands of people and made several hundreds of thousands homeless.
